alert.note: Alert for Absaroka, Beartooth Mountains; Beartooth Foothills; Golden Valley; Livingston Area; Melville Foothills; Northern Stillwater; Northern Sweet Grass (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 12:34AM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS WITH HEAVY RAINFALL WILL IMPACT CENTRAL STILLWATER...WESTERN CARBON...SOUTHWESTERN GOLDEN VALLEY...SWEET GRASS AND SOUTH CENTRAL PARK COUNTIES THROUGH 115 AM MDT... At 1230 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of showers and thunderstorms with heavy rainfall. The showers and storms were along a line extending from 12 miles northeast of Big Timber to 21 miles northwest of Absarokee to 24 miles northwest of Cooke City, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...The heavy rainfall will cause a quick reduction in visibility, along with ponding of water on roadways, and quick water rises on streams and ditches.. Locations impacted include... Big Timber, Absarokee, Reed Point, Melville, Fishtail, Greycliff, Nye, Dean, and Mc Leod. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Absaroka, Beartooth Mountains; Beartooth Foothills; Golden Valley; Livingston Area; Melville Foothills; Northern Stillwater; Northern Sweet Grass
